errors.password_min_length: The password must be at least 8 characters long.
errors.password_uppercase: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
errors.password_number: The password must contain at least one number (digit 0-9).
errors.password_lowercase: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
errors.password_special_char: The password must contain at least one special character, such as !@#$%^&*(),.?":{}|<>.

shipping.shipping_intro: We offer fast and secure shipping options so you can receive your products as soon as possible. Before making your purchase, we recommend carefully reviewing the product specifications to ensure it meets your expectations.
shipping.return_policy_intro: We accept product returns as long as they meet the following conditions:
shipping.return_condition_1: The product must be in its original packaging, unopened, and with no signs of use.
shipping.return_condition_2: Returns will not be accepted for products that have been opened, damaged, or show signs of misuse.
shipping.return_condition_3: Perishable items such as food, medicine, or any product with an expiration date cannot be returned under any circumstances.
shipping.terms_conditions_intro: All return requests must be made within the first 14 days after receiving the product. The customer is responsible for the return shipping costs unless the return is due to a manufacturing defect or an error in the order. Once we receive the product at our facilities, we will inspect its condition and proceed with a refund or exchange as appropriate.
shipping.contact_for_more_info: For more information about our shipping and return policies, please contact us. We're here to help.
